alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 25 at 3:16PM MDT until April 26 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Fremont and Pueblo Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest amounts are expected to be near the mountains.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
